summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 26th Avenue West from Elmore Street to a point 300 feet south of Thurman Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8851 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
